verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he will hold a summit with the North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore on June 12] .
Trump says he [V: will] hold a summit with the North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore on June 12 .
Trump says [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: hold] [ARG1: a summit with the North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] .
